description: An imposing rectangular pillar, somehow noticeably towering over the nearby environment despite being only slightly taller than a man.  Your senses were never designed to discern it in full; it appears completely colorless, and the fractal detailing lies just barely out of comprehension.
A thin, palm-sized disc of incredibly dense stone, engraved with meaningless swirls.  Its surface seems to repel grime and debris, and it refuses to tarnish or scratch.
This brick of too-dense stone is warped in a way that just barely makes it worthless as a building material.  Its smooth surface is unmarred by texture, dirt, or color.
